blockdesc-cartographytable: A workstation for sharing map data. Interact to synchronize your discoveries.
commanddesc-mapper-restore: Enables Mapper mod if it was disabled and overwrites old data.
commandresult-cartographytable-download: Received {0} chunks from the Cartography table.
commandresult-cartographytable-upload: Sent {0} chunks to the Cartography table.
commandresult-mapper-restore-client-erro: Mapper mod doesn't have any corrupted data on the client.
commandresult-mapper-restore-client-requ: Ok, Mapper mod enabled on the client.
commandresult-mapper-restore-client-succ: Ok, a request to restore your data was sent to the server.
commandresult-mapper-restore-server-erro: Mapper mod doesn't have any corrupted data on the server.
commandresult-mapper-restore-server-succ: Ok, Mapper mod enabled on the server.
error-cartographytable-outdated: Your request to synchronize the map with the cartography table couldn't be processed because someone else updated the table before you.
error-cartographytable-sync-pending: Cannot synchronize, the server hasn't responded to your previous synchronization request yet.
error-mod-data-corrupted-client: Mapper mod disabled itself to protect stored client data, type '.mapper restore' if you wish to enable it and overwrite corrupted data.
error-mod-data-corrupted-server: <font color='red'>Mapper mod disabled itself to protect stored server data, please contact the server owner to fix this issue.</font>
error-mod-disabled: World map usage is not allowed on this server, please contact the server owner to enable it using `/worldconfig allowMap true` and restart the server.
error-no-paintset: You need to have a painter's palette in your left hand
error-unexplored-map: You have to reveal this part with the map item before being able to place waypoints there.
error-unexplored-map-propick: Prospecting results are not saved, you have to reveal this part with the map item first.
gamemechanicinfo-mapping-text:
Mapping (Cartography)
Chart the world, one chunk at a time!

Maps are not free anymore and keeping them updated will take both time and resources. When you start, you don't know where you are nor the direction you are headed. Primitive compass will help you with that. Keeping track of where you have been will require a map. It is a consumable item and holding right mouse button will chart an area around you. No waypoints can be placed outside of the charted area. All maps start as a variation of grayscale and can be repainted with a paintbrush and a painter's palette. As you progress, you will discover more advanced materials for these tools.

Compass
- Variants: primitive and regular
- Required for showing position and direction overlay (coordinateshud) in uncharted territory; accuracy depends on item type.

Map
- Variants: primitive and precise
- A consumable item without durability; adds map chunks starting from player position and going in circle.
- Higher scales can chart a larger area with limited resolution.
- Waypoint placement requires a charted area.
- Shows player position in charted areas, no compass needed.
- Maps don't refresh automatically, they need to be repainted.

Drawing kits
- Variants: charcoal, vintage and colorful
- A consumable item with durability; paints an area based on the selected tool mode. Lower-resolution maps use less durability.
- Apart from the charcoal kit, it must be held in your left hand with a paintbrush in your right hand.
itemdesc-compass-precise-*: Scout distant lands with precision and stop worrying about getting lost.
itemdesc-compass-primitive-*: Helps you find your way home or at least rough direction.
itemdesc-map-precise-coal: A more accurate mapping method, more details, and simply more paper.
itemdesc-map-primitive-coal: A good starting tool for amateur cartographers.
itemdesc-paintbrush: Equip a painter's palette in your left hand to paint the map.
itemdesc-paintset-*: Use a paintbrush in your right hand to paint the map.
itemdesc-paintset-coal: Sketch your surroundings on map with black pigment.
toolmode-map-scale: Scale 1:{0} ({p1:0.# blocks|# block|# blocks} per pixel)
toolmode-paintbrush-refresh: Refresh map state in {0}-chunk radius ({1} total)
toolmode-paintbrush-upgrade: Upgrade map color in {0}-chunk radius ({1} total)
